roboguice.fragment
Class RoboFragment

java.lang.Object
  android.support.v4.app.Fragment
      roboguice.fragment.RoboFragment
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener
public abstract class RoboFragment
extends android.support.v4.app.Fragment

Provides an injected Fragment based on support library v4. A RoboFragment will see all its members and views injected after onViewCreated(View, Bundle).

Author:
Michael Burton
